title: Is Prayer Valid Without Tajweed? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: Muhammad from Malaysia Hello Assalamu Alaikum Sheikh Wa'alaikumussalam How are you? Alhamdulillah First of all, I am your biggest air conditioner Masha Allah, may Allah promote you to a central air conditioner Shukran Jazila for having me today May Allah bless you for all your good deeds And may Allah give you the highest level of Jannah Ameen, and you as well What can I do for you? If we don't, does the prayer invalid? No, that Tajweed, again and again and again Tajweed is highly recommended to beautify your recitation But it is not mandatory Your Salat is valid So instead of saying Instead of saying There is Qalqala, there is Mad, there is this and that If I say Fine Your prayer is valid and it has no impact on the validity I hope this answers your question
